name: Coquinaria
description:
Every three years, the city of Coquinaria organizes a culinary tournament, the final of which determines the Emperor-Gourmet's future head chef for the next three years.

On the other hand, the losers, covered with shame, must begin a terrifying professional reconversion.

The Emperor-Gourmet's kitchens are too small for two imperial-starred chefs.

Prove to the Emperor as well as to the crowd your mastery of cooking by crushing (gustatory AND literally) the one who is standing in front of you.

.Genre : Fighting game

.Number of players : 2, local

.Development time : 1 month

.Platform : Windows & Mac
